definition: meals (abbr. for 伙食[huo3 shi2])/variant of 夥|伙[huo3]

sentences.english: Steven Kennard:What are the requirements for ABP choosing international partners?
sentences.chinese: 總部基地在全球選擇合作伙伴都有哪些要求？

sentences.english: People survive because they are really good cooperators.
sentences.chinese: 人們進化是因爲他們彼此間是最好的合作伙伴。

sentences.english: Pakistan is an important neighbor and strategic cooperative partner of China.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦是中國的重要鄰國和戰略合作伙伴。

sentences.english: Good price will be for creditable business partner.
sentences.chinese: 好價格將是可信的商業合作伙伴。

sentences.english: We are very proud of our partnership with Huaxin.
sentences.chinese: 與華新的合作伙伴關係使我們深感自豪。

sentences.english: He initiated and managed technology collaborations with Chinese partners for GM.
sentences.chinese: 他爲通用汽車發起並管理與中國合作伙伴的技術協作。

sentences.english: Joyou is one of our longstanding and highly valued business partners.
sentences.chinese: 中宇是我們長期和具有高度價值的商業合作伙伴。

sentences.english: Build infastructure, improve citicens's standard of living, Chinaand their partners are on the right track to success.
sentences.chinese: 中國及其合作伙伴正在成功的道路上行進。

sentences.english: Now a number of his partners are getting in on the act as well.
sentences.chinese: 現在他的一些合作伙伴也已經開始加入了他的行列。

sentences.english: EBONG is sincerely to become your best partner.
sentences.chinese: 系統，做您最理想的合作伙伴。

sentences.english: Under the new situation, both countries should continue to push forward their comprehensive strategic partnership.
sentences.chinese: 新形勢下，雙方要繼續推進全面戰略伙伴關係。

sentences.english: Switzerland has become an important cooperative partner of China's among Central European countries.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士已成爲中國在中歐國家中的重要合作伙伴。

sentences.english: Meade instruments has been a proud partner of Jinghua and Hejian for 15 years.
sentences.chinese: 米德器械很榮幸與晶華和赫建做了15年的合作伙伴。

sentences.english: Brazil wishes to continuously expand and deepen bilateral strategic partnership.
sentences.chinese: 巴西希望不斷擴大和深化巴中戰略伙伴關係。

sentences.english: We hope that the Haida can become partners and customers first choice.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望海達成爲客戶的合作伙伴和第一選擇。

sentences.english: Jinjiufu keeps its promise of faith and is as sincere as gold to its partners.
sentences.chinese: 金九福對信譽一諾千金，對客戶及合作伙伴赤誠如金。

definition: person of the same profession/of the same trade, occupation or industry
good friend/(slang) a visit from Aunt Flo (menstrual period)
close friend/pal/(social networking website) friend/CL:個|个[ge4]
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
to team up (with)/to put a team together
to cooperate/to collaborate/to work together/cooperation/CL:個|个[ge4]
